ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 62/faction limits
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe the scale goes like this: Scowls (being the worst - KOS) Threatenly (KOS if you hang around) Dubiously Apprehensibly Indifferent Amiable Warmly
ygData.messageBody:
I believe the scale goes like this:

Scowls (being the worst - KOS)
Threatenly (KOS if you hang around)
Dubiously
Apprehensibly
Indifferent
Amiable
Warmly
Kindly (Best possible faction - best prices)

Let me know if I've forgotten one or put one in the wrong order.

Quasinom de Plume

--- carlos <quatoria@...> wrote:
> From: "carlos" <quatoria@...>
>
> Incorrect, amiable is not highest. I've got a warm response from most
> of
> the gnomes in Ak'Anon. It just takes a LONG time to get it. <grin>
>
>
> Salkiri As'ad
> Enchantress
> 41st circle
> Veeshan Server
